data.comment: The match has started.
Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Soualiho Meite for Torino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
Lazio have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 5, Lazio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Torino.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Torino.
In the minute 7, Torino have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Torino.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Torino in the half of Lazio.
In Turin Torino attack through Simone Verdi. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
In the minute 12, Lazio drive forward but Vedat Muriqi is judged offside.
Daniele Chiffi signals a Lazio throw-in in Torino's half.
Goal! Lazio have got their heads in front thanks to a Andreas Pereira strike.
In the minute 15, Great play from Patric to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Lazio in their own half.
Torino's Karol Linetty gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Torino.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Bremer.
That's a fine assist from Simone Verdi.
Andrea Belotti returns to the field for Torino after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 21, Andrea Belotti is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Lazio are coming forward and Patric gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 22, Torino have a goal kick.
Torino have been awarded a penalty...
Andrea Belotti smashes in a penalty at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. The score is now 2-1.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Free kick Lazio.
Throw-in high up the field for Lazio in Turin.
In the minute 28, Free kick in a good position for Lazio!
Throw-in for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Lazio's Andreas Pereira misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 31, Daniele Chiffi awards Torino a goal kick.
Daniele Chiffi awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Andrea Belotti (Torino) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Torino have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
In the minute 38, Daniele Chiffi awards Lazio a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lazio in the half of Torino.
Torino have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Can Lazio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Play has been interrupted briefly in Turin to check on Tomas Rincon, who is grimacing with pain.
Torinoâ€™s Tomas Rincon is on his feet again at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 44, Andreas Pereira for Lazio has been booked by Daniele Chiffi and receives a first yellow card.
Andrea Belotti for Torino is whistled offside.
Daniele Chiffi will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, In Turin Lazio's Vedat Muriqi is caught offside.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Simone Inzaghi (Lazio) is making a first substitution, with Jean Akpa replacing Andreas Pereira.
Simone Inzaghi is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino with Lucas Leiva replacing Marco Parolo.
In the minute 47, Daniele Chiffi awards the home team a throw-in.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! Sergej Milinkovic-Savic equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
In the minute 50, It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
In Turin, Andrea Belotti of Torino is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Torino.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
Torino have a goal kick.
Torino to take a throw-in in Lazio territory.
In the minute 55, Daniele Chiffi signals a Torino throw-in in Lazio's half.
Simone Verdi hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Turin for Torino.
Lazio's Jean Akpa breaks free at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
The away team have replaced Vedat Muriqi with Ciro Immobile. This is the third substitution made today by Simone Inzaghi.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
In the minute 59, Lazio drive upfield and Jean Akpa gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Torino defender.
Daniele Chiffi signals a throw-in for Torino, close to Lazio's area.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 62, Lazio to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
Lazio push upfield but Daniele Chiffi quickly pulls them for offside.
Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Lazio in the half of Torino.
Throw-in for Lazio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 66, Andrea Belotti is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Torino's Andrea Belotti looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Torino needs to be cautious. Lazio have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 70, Lazio have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
Can Lazio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Torino's half?
Wilfried Stephane Singo is replacing Mergim Vojvoda for the home team.
Throw-in for Lazio in the half of Torino.
In the minute 71, Nicolas N`Koulou is replacing Simone Verdi for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Throw-in Torino.
In the minute 73, The away team replace Joaquin Correa with Felipe Caicedo.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
In the minute 75, Lazio push forward at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino and Jean Akpa gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Torino defence.
Can Lazio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Andrea Belotti.
Free kick Torino.
In the minute 76, Federico Bonazzoli is on a sub for Andrea Belotti for Torino.
Daniele Chiffi signals a throw-in for Torino, close to Lazio's area.
In the minute 79, Torino are whistled for offside.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In the minute 80, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Torino in Turin.
Danilo Cataldi is replacing Mohamed Fares for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 82, Torino have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
In Turin Torino drive forward through Lyanco. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
In the minute 85, Lazio's Wesley Hoedt has been booked in Turin.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Torino.
Throw-in for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 87, Sasa Lukic puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 3-2.
At Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino, Ciro Immobile has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 89, Ciro Immobile of Lazio gets in a strike, but is off target.
Daniele Chiffi awards Torino a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Throw-in for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Lazio have been given a penalty...
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Lazio.
Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
That's full-time at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. The final score is 3-4.
Nicolas N`Koulou is booked for the home team.
Ciro Immobile scores from the spot and Lazio draw level at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Tomas Rincon (Torino) has received a yellow card from Daniele Chiffi.
Goal! Felipe Caicedo gives Lazio a 3-4 lead in Turin.
Felipe Caicedo for Lazio has been booked by Daniele Chiffi and receives a first yellow card.
